title: Research and Software Solutions
text:
Kwiz Computing Technologies Limited (Kwiz Research) is a research and software consulting company building solutions and infrastructure around the R programming Language.
What we do:
Software Solutions

build R/Shiny web applications for enterprise that;

integrate API calls to provision, deploy and manage secure and scalable cloud (AWS) resources
integrate Databases and solutions written in other popular languages (e.g Python)

design and implement algorithms to automate Management and High Performance Mathematical Computing workflows
author and publish with scientific markdown high-quality (e.g articles, reports, websites, blogs, … in HTML, PDF, MS Word, …)
deploy static and interactive web solutions created in R

Research Solutions

consult on research methodologies and evaluation metrics
reproducible data processing, analysis and the synthesis and presentation of results


The Team


Kwizera Jean Victor: Co-Founder

 Kwizera is an R Developer, Data Scientist, Researcher; with a background in Actuarial Science and Data Science, and with over 6 years experience Programming in and around the R programming language. He is passionate about open source technologies, mathematical computing and research.
Kwizera has worked in research and business consulting, including:

modeling and simulating ecological processes and financial trading strategies,
evaluating sample data biases,
building forest inventory and climate models,
analyzing credit markets

building interactive dashboards and
automating workflows

He is a problem solver with keen interest in Automation, Integration, Mathematical Computing and Cloud Solutions.
jeankwizera@kwizresearch.com



Iragena Vincent De Paul: Co-Founder

 Iragena is a graduate of Economics from the University of Nairobi. He is passionate about Project Management, operations and policy. He also has interest in software and music and he invests some of his time developing electronic music.
vindepaul@kwizresearch.com

title: About
text:
Kwizera is a Data Scientist with a background in Actuarial Science and Data Science with over 6 years experience in Statistical Programming. He is passionate about open source technologies, mathematical computing and research.
Jean has worked in research and business consulting, simulating and modeling ecological processes and Forex trading strategies, building forest inventory models, analyzing credit markets and building dashboards. He is a problem solver with keen interest in algorithm development for Automation, Integration and Mathematical Computing.
jeankwizera@kwizresearch.com

title: Training
text: We offer training to Individuals and Institutions on data analysis and software development integrating R programming and other software platforms including Python, Javascript, CSS, HTML, React and Database solutions.
